title: Big Mac Attack
description:
Mina and Charles McDonald of USA Today play Right Call or Wrong Call as they discuss the Patriots' release of Cam Newton, the Bears rolling with Andy Dalton in Week 1, the 49ers' two quarterback system, and Teddy Bridgewater winning the job in Denver.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
